name: Dark Pucks
description:
Description

Dark Pucks is a small, hardcore action game about killing bosses with a high variability of fights,. Inspired by board games, Doom and Titan Souls.

The game has 4 bosses, 11 creatures and abilities.

The game is not finished and is most likely to be changed in the future. If you have any suggestions for improvement or have something to say write in the comments.

Game mechanics manual

 

The hero has three characteristics, health, strength and energy.

When dealing damage the hero spends his strength. Killing creatures restores health.

Energy is spent on abilities, if there is not enough energy then health will be spent.

-Before you fight a boss you can choose a few minions.

 -Each minion will appear during the fight and give your hero an ability or some effect.

- You can watch the summoning process in the lower-left corner

During the game essence can be dropped from the creatures mostly they have a positive effect.

 - restores and slightly increases max health

- increases damage, damage ignores armor  - restores energy, increases speed - creates a spike effect, all damage is reflected to the attacker - doesn't do anything

- creates an effect that deals damage to everyone on the battlefield, greatly increases combo multiplier
